articles.title: Delhi witnesses heavy rainfall creating major traffic snarls
articles.description: Heavy rainfall lashed parts of Delhi, leading to major traffic congestion in the evening hours. Many colonies experienced waterlogging.
articles.content: In the evening, the city witnessed torrential downpour leading to severe waterlogging and disruption of routine travel. Authorities advised residents to refrain from unnecessary travel.

articles.title: India and world news: Markets steady
articles.description: Domestic markets remained steady despite global volatility as some sectors showed resilience.
articles.content: The financial markets in India held steady today amid global volatility, with investors focusing on domestic earnings.

articles.title: Education reforms announced by the ministry
articles.description: New reforms proposed aim to bridge quality gaps in rural education.
articles.content: The ministry proposed new measures targeting infrastructure and teacher training to improve outcomes in rural schools.

articles.title: Tech firms expand in India after policy changes
articles.description: Several global tech firms are expanding operations due to improved investment climate.
articles.content: Policy changes aimed at simplifying regulations have encouraged firms to increase their footprints in India.

articles.title: Health: New guidelines on nutrition
articles.description: Experts call for improved diet and community-based interventions.
articles.content: A panel of health experts suggested community-driven programs that focus on nutrition and monitor progress.
